Suburbia.name: Divorcee (38)
Suburbia.description: Recently divorced parent exploring online dating for the first time. Wary, witty, but still hopeful.

Suburbia.name: HOA President
Suburbia.description: Power-hungry enforcer of suburban order. Politely racist and obsessed with property values.

Suburbia.name: Disillusioned Realtor
Suburbia.description: Former top-seller turned burnout. Knows every foreclosure in the neighborhood.

Urban Core.name: Queer Activist
Urban Core.description: Outspoken and impassioned, theyâ€™ve been at every protest since 2016. Looks for emotional intelligence in matches.

Urban Core.name: Artist (nonbinary)
Urban Core.description: Lives in a converted warehouse. Makes zines and hates dating apps, but uses them anyway.

Urban Core.name: Club Promoter
Urban Core.description: Knows where the underground party is. Emotionally unavailable, charming, and possibly dangerous.

Rural Outskirts.name: Hunter
Rural Outskirts.description: Quiet and well-armed. Distrusts city folk but warms up if you know your game laws.

Rural Outskirts.name: Opioid Survivor
Rural Outskirts.description: Recovering addict who lost friends to fentanyl. Deeply empathetic and trauma-aware.

Rural Outskirts.name: Veteran (PTSD)
Rural Outskirts.description: Highly disciplined but haunted. Struggles with connection and mistrusts government programs.

Squatter Zone.name: Street Medic
Squatter Zone.description: Part-time EMT, full-time protest medic. Carries Narcan and speaks in anarchist slang.

Squatter Zone.name: Punk Nomad
Squatter Zone.description: Lives out of a tent and dumpster dives. Charismatic and deeply idealistic.

Squatter Zone.name: Burner
Squatter Zone.description: Radically self-expressive, polyamorous, and hard to pin down. Spiritual but unpredictable.
